sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="wf_element_activity"><wf_element_activity action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><attributes/><base_provider display_value="Probe">a05a3f83eb412100b2f88a7af106feaa</base_provider><category>AnC Custom</category><checked_out_by/><default_height/><default_width/><description>The Test Server Alive activity tests a server for activity on a specific protocol.

Any protocol the server can recognize is appropriate, such as wmi, wins, https, ssh, http, snmp, or dns.

The activity state tells the workflow engine how to handle the record being executed. Possible state values are:
*Executing: the workflow engine starts the 'run' function of the activity.
*Waiting: the workflow engine ignores the activity until a specific event to restart the activity is fired. 
*Finished: the activity finished running. See the result value for the outcome of the activity.
*Cancelled: this activity, or the workflow that contains this activity, was canceled.
*Error: a JavaScript error occurred. Review the logs for error details.

The result values assigned by this activity are: 
Success: the server responded using the specified protocol.
Failed: the server did not respond.</description><image>images/heisenberg_icons/workflow_ie8/provider_probe.png</image><input_meta>{"name":"Input","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"hostname","type":"STRING","mandatory":true},{"name":"port_probes","type":"STRING","mandatory":true}]}</input_meta><input_process_script><![CDATA[var midServerName = gs.getProperty('mid.server.rba_default');

var rangeParamObj = {};
rangeParamObj.name = "range";
rangeParamObj.value = 
	'<discovery_ranges>' + 
		'<meta_coll>' + 
			'<inc_exc_coll>' +
				'<mid_server>' + midServerName + '</mid_server>' +
				'<summary/>' +
				'<include><ip_list>' +
					'<ip>' + activityInput.hostname + '</ip>' +
				'</ip_list></include>' +
				'<exclude><ip_list/></exclude>' +
			'</inc_exc_coll>' +
		'</meta_coll>' +
	'</discovery_ranges>';

executionParam.parameters.push(rangeParamObj);

var probeObj = {};
probeObj.name = "port_probe_spec";
probeObj.value = getPortProbeSpec();
executionParam.parameters.push(probeObj);

function getPortProbeSpec() {
	var pp = '' + activityInput.port_probes;
	var ppns = pp.split(',');
	var gr = new GlideRecord('discovery_port_probe');
	gr.addQuery('name', ppns);
	gr.query();
	var pps = [];
	while (gr.next())
		pps.push(new global.DiscoveryPortProbe(gr));
	return makeProbeSpec(pps);
}

function makeProbeSpec(pps) {
	var xml = [];
	xml.push('<portprobes>');
	for (var p = 0; p < pps.length; p++) {
		var pp = pps[p];
		xml.push('<portprobe>');
		xml.push('<name>' + pp.name + '</name>');
		xml.push('<scanner>' + pp.scanner + '</scanner>');
		xml.push('<description>' + pp.description + '</description>');
		xml.push('<conditional>' + (pp.conditional ? 'true' : 'false') + '</conditional>');
		for (var i = 0; i < pp.services.length; i++) {
			var svc = pp.services[i];
			xml.push('<service>');
			xml.push('<name>' + svc.name + '</name>');
			xml.push('<port>' + svc.port + '</port>');
			xml.push('<type>' + svc.protocol + '</type>');
			xml.push('</service>');
		}
		xml.push('</portprobe>');
	}
	xml.push('</portprobes>');
	return xml.join('');
}]]></input_process_script><input_transform>{"probe_label":"Shazzam","probe":"eb95df760ab301550015543188996362","source":"${activityInput.hostname}","parameters":"[]","midCapabilities":""}</input_transform><local_variables>{"name":"Local","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[]}</local_variables><name>Test Server Alive</name><output_meta>{"name":"Output","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"alive","type":"STRING"}]}</output_meta><output_process_script/><output_transform>[{"toLink":"activityOutput.alive","description":"","to":"alive","toType":"string","toDestination":"activityOutput","sourceLabel":"executionResult.payload","from":"${executionResult.payload}","fromSource":"executionResult","type":"XML","children":"[]","translation":"/results/@alive"}]</output_transform><processing_script/><sample_payloads>{"executionResult.output":{"payload":"<results sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="wf_element_activity"><wf_element_activity action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><attributes/><base_provider display_value="Run Script">d0c7fe11eb013100fc5e8a7af106fee0</base_provider><category>AnC Custom</category><checked_out_by/><default_height/><default_width/><description/><image>images/heisenberg_icons/workflow_ie8/provider_runscript.png</image><input_meta>{"name":"Input","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"ciName","type":"STRING","mandatory":false}]}</input_meta><input_process_script/><input_transform/><local_variables/><name>Get CI IP</name><output_meta>{"name":"Output","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"u_ip","type":"STRING"}]}</output_meta><output_process_script/><output_transform/><processing_script><![CDATA[var ciID = activityInput.ciName;  //input reference field to cmdb_ci table  
var ciRec = new GlideRecord("cmdb_ci");  
ciRec.addQuery("name",ciID); 
ciRec.query();

if (ciRec.next()){
	activityOutput.u_ip = ciRec.ip_address;
	
}
else {
	activityOutput.u_ip = "Not Found"; 
	
}

sys_update_xml.name: sc_cat_item_d100b889db810b00704df9b61d96195c
sys_update_xml.payload:
trueon_desktopfalse856d2009db810b00704df9b61d96193c01970-01-03 00:00:00

Performs the Following Post Install Tasks

  • Updates Apache Config File for New Server
  • Updates Adds Server to Load Balancer as Member and provisions new Virtual Host
  • Restarts Apache on both Server and Load Balancer
  • Performs Discovery of Server and Load Balancer
  • Configures Monitoring for the New Server
  • Restars Nagios

]]>falsetrue0falseuse_desktop_picturePost Web Server Configurationfalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalsefalse0JavaScript: popupOpenStandard("com.glideapp.servicecatalog_cat_item_view.do?v=1&sysparm_id=d100b889db810b00704df9b61d96195c&sysparm_preview=true", "summary");00snc_internal5dbca4c5db810b00704df9b61d961937Post Web Server Configurationfalsefalsesc_cat_itemadmin2017-09-05 01:21:42d100b889db810b00704df9b61d96195c2Post Web Server Configurationglobalglobalsc_cat_item_d100b889db810b00704df9b61d96195cadmin2018-03-09 20:27:54

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="wf_element_activity"><wf_element_activity action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><attributes/><base_provider display_value="Run Script">d0c7fe11eb013100fc5e8a7af106fee0</base_provider><category>AnC Custom</category><checked_out_by/><default_height/><default_width/><description>Uses the CI Name field to look up the CI and delete the record. </description><image>images/heisenberg_icons/workflow_ie8/provider_runscript.png</image><input_meta>{"name":"Input","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"ciName","type":"STRING","mandatory":false},{"name":"ciTable","type":"STRING","mandatory":false}]}</input_meta><input_process_script/><input_transform/><local_variables/><name>Delete CI Record</name><output_meta>{"name":"Output","type":"DATA_OBJECT","properties":[{"name":"status","type":"STRING"}]}</output_meta><output_process_script/><output_transform/><processing_script><![CDATA[var ciID = activityInput.ciName;  //input reference field to cmdb_ci table  
var ciRec = new GlideRecord(activityInput.ciTable);  
ciRec.addQuery("name",ciID); 
ciRec.query();

if (ciRec.next()){
	ciRec.deleteRecord();
	activityOutput.status = "Found - Deleted";
	
}
else {
	activityOutput.status = "Not Found"; 
	
}
	
	


]]></processing_script><sample_payloads>{}</sample_payloads><short_description>Delete CI Record from chmod 775 rw
chown -R nagios:nagios *
systemctl restart nagios
